entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,429Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 110

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until you can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready.  --OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14.--Updates on Wednesdays. Yes, the title has changed! It is still from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: tell me don’t, crawl back in
entry.summary:
Author: oneofthesirens

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,711Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 72

Summary: Buck kissed him for — for some reason. Eddie’s not really sure why. He can’t parse the hows and the whys of that right now when he needs to snap Buck out of a spiral.“Buck, you need to calm down,” Eddie says. Buck just makes a miserable noise. “Can you look at me for a sec?”“No can do,” Buck says, voice tight. “I’m too busy trying to figure out how to fake my own death.” Despite himself, Eddie snorts and Buck whirls around, affronted. “Eddie, I’m being so serious right now. This is one of the top most embarrassing moments of my life.”or: Buck kisses Eddie over a kettle. Eddie’s straight.Eddie kisses Buck over pans. He’s — not so straight.

entry.title: Muscle Memory
entry.summary:
Author: pinkysparkles

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,386Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 150

Summary: Buck didn’t exactly expect him to pull the trigger in all fairness. When the shot rang out, surprise hit him harder than the actual bullet. Time didn’t still. Worlds didn’t crumble. He didn’t see his life flash before his eyes. The film directors had clearly never been shot before.———(Or, as Buck finds himself trapped in yet another life-or-death situation, Eddie struggles to grapple with the reality that all he can do is watch through a screen.)

entry.title: Don't Follow the Voice
entry.summary:
Author: Jackaroony

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,461Chapters: 9/11Kudos: 22

Summary: Instead of staying in LA as usual, the 118 decided that this time their team building would happen at the cabin on the mountain. You know, pretty views, separated from the world by the cable car... Only 5 of them to have a weekend of their life. However, Buck and Eddie didn't expect that the moment they arrive at the mountain, they would be stuck there until dawn.After what Eddie hears at night, they all wish that wasn't the case.

entry.title: I Keep Going The Wrong Way
entry.summary:
Author: SkippyTheirin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,262Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 3

Summary: It's been two months since Eddie blew up his life again, forcing his son 800 miles away from home. It's been one month since he started pushing others away, afraid to catch them in his self-destruction. It's this morning that Buck shows up to his house out of the blue and attempts to free Eddie from his wallowing in self-pity. It's tonight that Eddie makes what might be the worst, or best, mistake of his life.Or:Eddie Diaz goes on a journey of self-discovery and stumbles along the way. Luckily, he has people to help pick him up.

entry.title: Of Fire and Flames
entry.summary:
Author: the_writing_page

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,110Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: In a world where the Mockingjay failed, Evan Buckley and Eddie Diaz are the next to be reaped in the 99th Annual Hunger Games.Eddie has one thought on his mind: getting back to his son.Buck refuses to allow the Capitol to win.Together they fight, and make some unexpected alliances along the way.The Games wants them to be enemies, but together, they will egnite the flame of the rebellion to end it once and for all.

entry.title: “Fanboy Fanatics and His Best Friend”
entry.summary:
Author: seth_writes16

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,506Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 117

Summary: Where Buck is obsessed with this firefighter drama, staring Oliver Stark and Ryan Guzman, and he convinces Eddie to start watching it too. When he gets too excited over the latest developments from the show, Eddie gets caught up in Buck’s slow-burn romance analysis of the actor’s characters. They eventually meet the cast at their station and Eddie figures out his growing feelings for his best friend.Or: Buck and Eddie meet Oliver Stark and Ryan Guzman because Buck’s obsessed with this show about firefighters.

entry.title: touched by sweet hands
entry.summary:
Author: realil

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,299Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: "You do matter to me" Eddie meant it, he meant it with every ounce of his soul, he was going to 𝘮𝘪𝘴𝘴 Buck. He was his best friend, his partner, and he is so grateful for everything Buck has done for him, and for Chris when he still lived in LA."I know" Buck had said, with a small smile and wet eyes. Eddie wanted to cry too, but he wouldn't allow himself, not out on the street in front of a home he's losing so many memories to, and definitely not in front of Buck. Any other time, he would've let the pressure build and release because it was Buck, Buck would understand and be his support, but... He's been through enough these past few days, and Eddie was sure that breaking down in front of him right now wasn't going to help either of them.

entry.title: Royal Pains
entry.summary:
Author: Reading_was_here

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,392Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: “Do I look like I was born yesterday?” the Prince raised his eyebrow towards the advisor, “but just so We are both on the same page, how about you tell me what your thoughts are.” Nailed it. Beside him the King hung his head but let out a low chuckle, and even Hen cracked a smile. Before Chimney could add another sarcastic retort, Hen chimed in with actual information.“Well it is a big decision Buck. As much as our kingdoms would benefit from merging into one greater area, marriage is a grand ordeal. Of course, you would meet first and then if all goes well-”“Wait, marriage?!"

entry.title: "She Loves Me": a Buddie AU of a Golden Age Musical
entry.summary:
Author: HeraklesIsBi

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 653Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 0

Summary: It's 2022 and the 118 gets a new recruit: Edmundo "Eddie" Diaz. Diaz gets along well his Captain Bobby Nash, Hen, Chimney, the new probie Ravi, and kind of Tommy Kinard. The one person he doesn't get off to a great start with? Evan "Buck" Buckley. Throughout the next six months, the gang's love lives and non-romantic trysts are revealed. Here is my queer, 911, modern, AU version of "She Loves Me". Enjoy!

entry.title: I thought I deserved nothing, until I let myself deserve you
entry.summary:
Author: caarmeeem

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,180Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 12

Summary: Eddie had always known he loved men. It was a truth he carried since childhood. But something happened — something that made him believe those feelings were wrong. That he was undeserving of love. So he buried every part of himself that longed for it.Years later, back in Texas, he finally found the courage to tell Buck the truth. He held nothing back. And though Buck received it with emotion, it sent him spiraling — full of questions, confusion, and hesitation.Now, with Chris safe for the evening at Hen and Karen’s, Eddie calls Buck over for one last conversation. One where he finally opens every door he once closed.

entry.title: I'd Rather Go Blind
entry.summary:
Author: kissingconstellations_Kore (MoiraiFata)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,345Chapters: 2/11Kudos: 6

Summary: Every connection in his life has ended like a burning trainwreck. Going down one by one, every relationship that has ever meant something to him gets destroyed by his own choices and is now taking pieces of himself down with it. Pretending is all Eddie knows how to do but when he can no longer control his emotions, they spew out of him leaving him with the loss of the last connection he thought he would never lose.Or,Eddie's in his feelings and causes a brutal argument with Buck leaving their friendship in the air. When he runs to Texas, he discovers parts of himself he never thought possible and starts to put himself back together…one piece at a time.

entry.title: 5 times Buck doesn’t notice Eddie and Tommy fighting over him and 1 He notices
entry.summary:
Author: LLarcan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 557Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 15

Summary: “Evan is so-“ Tommy started to only be cut off. “Buck, he likes to be called Buck, which you should know because he’s your boyfriend- wait you broke up with him, didn’t you?” Eddie fully drain his beer.______________Or Eddie and Tommy fight over Buck 5 + 1 styleBUDDIE ENDGAME 😫
